titleStmt.title: To the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses of the House of Commons now assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the Company of Brewers of the citie of London.
titleStmt.author: Worshipful Company of Brewers.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: item at 2124.2:63 faded and torn with some loss of print.
Reproductions of originals in: British Library and Eton College Library.
